SELECT bq.`quotation_id`, bq.`quotation_no` AS quotationNo, bi.`contract_id`, bi.`contract_no`, bq.`quotation_type`, bc.`customer_name`, bc.`customer_nature`, bc.`customer_industry` , os.`office_staff_name` AS officeStaffName, os.office_address AS officeAddress, bi.`contract_price`, bq.staff_id, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(details_price*coefficient * number),2),0) FROM busi_quotation_details bqd WHERE bqd.quotation_id = bq.quotation_id ) AS quotationPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bod.details_price*bod.coefficient * bod.number),2),0) FROM busi_outsourcing_details bod WHERE bod.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS outsourcingPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpd.details_price * bpd.number),2),0) FROM busi_parts_details bpd WHERE bpd.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS partsPrice,
-- 成本 (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpd.sumPrice),2),0) FROM busi_price_details bpd WHERE bpd.`quotation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS priceSumPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(boc.sumPrice),2),0) FROM busi_outsourcing_cost boc WHERE boc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS outSumPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpc.`cost_price`),2),0) FROM busi_parts_cost bpc WHERE bpc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS partsSumPrice,
-- 真是成本 (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpd.actual_contractPrice),2),0) FROM busi_price_details bpd WHERE bpd.`quotation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS priceActualPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(boc.actualAllPrice),2),0) FROM busi_outsourcing_cost boc WHERE boc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS outActualPrice, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpc.`actual_price`),2),0) FROM busi_parts_cost bpc WHERE bpc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS partsActualPrice,
(SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpd.profit),2),0) FROM busi_price_details bpd WHERE bpd.`quotation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS priceProfit, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(boc.profit),2),0) FROM busi_outsourcing_cost boc WHERE boc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS outProfit, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpc.`profit`),2),0) FROM busi_parts_cost bpc WHERE bpc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS partsProfit,
(SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpd.actual_profit),2),0) FROM busi_price_details bpd WHERE bpd.`quotation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS priceActualProfit, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(boc.actualProfit),2),0) FROM busi_outsourcing_cost boc WHERE boc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS outActualProfit, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(bpc.`actual_profit`),2),0) FROM busi_parts_cost bpc WHERE bpc.quotation_id = bq.`quotation_id` ) AS partsActualProfit FROM busi_contract bi INNER JOIN busi_quotation bq ON bi.`qutation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN `busi_customer` bc ON bc.`customer_id` = bq.`customer_id` LEFT JOIN office_staff os ON os.`office_staff_id` = bq.`staff_id`
